topics.body:
ya know, checking out eminem old songs i found just how awesome he was rhyming, like rhyming multiple times the same word even entire verses like this.

Cause im *Shady*, they call me as *crazy* 
as the world was over this whole *Y2* K *thing*
And by the way, N' *sync*, *why do* they *sing*
Am I the only one who realizes they *stink*
Should I dye my hair *pink* and care what y'all *think*?
Lip *sync* and buy a bigger size of ear *rings*?
It's why I tend to block out when I hear *things*
Cause all these fans screamin is makin my ears *ring*

topics.body:
another one

These *ideas* are night *mares* to white *parents*
Whose worst fear is a child with dyed *hair* and who likes *earrings*
Like whatever they say has no *bearing* , it's so *scary* in a house that allows no *swearing*
To see him walking around with his headphones *blaring*
Alone in his own zone, cold and he don't *care* 


and a small one for ending.

*insanity*, can it be *vanity*, where is the *humanity*
in having a twisted *fantasy* with an arm and leg *amputee*
